title: [Admission] Any SC/ST students please tell about the fees through KCET admission
content: Do we have to pay the fees on reporting the clg or do they cut it from the scholarship?

comments.body: Hmm no offense it's just 500 or something really low , and you have to pay for it, and if you want scholarship you would have to pay 10k extra and that will be refunded back if you get....
